description: This course is designed to help you come up with a digital product in a niche you may or may not have experience with. This course will help you market profitably with or without any prior knowledge or skills in the areas of email marketing, product creation, affiliate marketing or internet marketing. We will also learn how to recruit willing volunteers who will gladly help spread the word about your new creation and how to ramp up the process in the future
title: Zero Cost Product Creation
